title: 服务器不稳定，经常有玩家掉线
author: hhh12314
txt_content:
以下是今天重启后的日志：
[10:20:23] [Netty Epoll Server IO #0/INFO] [FML]: Client protocol version 2
[10:20:23] [Netty Epoll Server IO #0/INFO] [FML]: Client attempting to join with 7 mods : minecraft@1.12.2,sponge@1.12.2-7.2.0,FML@8.0.99.99,spongeapi@7.2-fe189dcf,spongeforge@1.12.2-2838-7.2.0,forge@14.23.5.2838,mcp@9.42

[10:20:25] [Server thread/INFO] [minecraft/PlayerList]: Eliseshusband [/120.239.236.76:10196] logged in with entity id [268] in world (minecraft:overworld/0) at (236.06352401265184, 72.0, 135.38584227483193).
[10:20:26] [Server thread/INFO] [minecraft/DedicatedServer]: Eliseshusband joined the game
[10:21:26] [Netty Epoll Server IO #0/ERROR] [FML]: NetworkDispatcher exception
io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutException: null

[10:22:12] [Netty Epoll Server IO #1/ERROR] [FML]: NetworkDispatcher exception
io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutException: null
[10:22:12] [Server thread/INFO] [minecraft/NetHandlerPlayServer]: Eliseshusband lost connection: Timed out
> [10:26:35] [Netty Epoll Server IO #1/INFO] [FML]: Client protocol version 2
[10:26:35] [Netty Epoll Server IO #1/INFO] [FML]: Client attempting to join with 7 mods : minecraft@1.12.2,sponge@1.12.2-7.2.0,FML@8.0.99.99,spongeapi@7.2-fe189dcf,spongeforge@1.12.2-2838-7.2.0,forge@14.23.5.2838,mcp@9.42

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
hhh12314 发表于 2020-5-30 10:40
需要进行什么调整么？
你可以让玩家挂一个 uu 加速器，其中的加速国服似乎对于国际版也有效

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: 看上去仅仅只是网络问题
